wikipedia_page.main:
Peter Tendai Cousins (born 3 March 1981 in Harlow) is a British judoka.
Cousins represented Great Britain at the 2008 Summer Olympics in the Half-Heavyweight Judo event and was eliminated in the first round.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2008 Summer Olympics
Judo at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Men's 100 kg

response: He holds wins over Olympic bronze medalists Dimitri Peters and Movlud Miraliyev, World Championships silver metalists Peter Cousins and Vitaly Bubon, and Pan American gold medalist Mário Sabino.
